name: crossy-fullstack-e2e
description: Integrated E2E user stories covering frontend UI, backend API, database operations, and WebSocket real-time features via Playwright

userStories.title: User registration with credentials
userStories.description: As a new user, I can register with display name, email, and password
acceptanceCriteria: Start dev server if not running
Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Click 'Login' button in header to open AuthModal
Verify API returns 201 status with user object and JWT token
Verify user name 'TestUser' appears in header
Take screenshot to confirm registered state

userStories.title: User login with credentials
userStories.description: As a returning user, I can log in with my email and password
acceptanceCriteria: Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Verify API returns 200 status with user and JWT token
Verify user name appears in header
Take screenshot to confirm logged-in state

userStories.title: Guest login for quick play
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can play as a guest with an optional display name
acceptanceCriteria: Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Verify API returns 201 status with guest user (isGuest: true)
Take screenshot to confirm guest state

userStories.title: Login with invalid credentials shows error
userStories.description: As a user, I see an error message when I enter incorrect login credentials
acceptanceCriteria: Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Verify error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed in modal

userStories.title: User logout clears session
userStories.description: As a logged-in user, I can log out and my session is cleared
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify user name appears in header
Verify header shows 'Login' button (not user name)
Verify redirect to home page (protected route)

userStories.title: View user profile with stats
userStories.description: As a logged-in user, I can view my profile page with statistics
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify API /users/me returns 200 with user data
Verify display name is shown on page
Verify email is shown on page
Verify 'Average Solve Time' stat is displayed

userStories.title: View puzzle history
userStories.description: As a logged-in user, I can view my puzzle completion history
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify API returns 200 with puzzle history array
Verify history list is displayed (or empty state if no history)
If history exists: verify each entry shows puzzle date
If history exists: verify each entry shows solve time
If history exists: verify each entry shows completion status

userStories.title: Load today's puzzle
userStories.description: As a user, I can view and play today's daily puzzle
acceptanceCriteria: Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Verify API returns 200 with puzzle data
Verify crossword grid is rendered with correct dimensions
Verify Across clues list is displayed
Verify Down clues list is displayed

userStories.title: Select cell and enter letter
userStories.description: As a player, I can click a cell and type a letter
acceptanceCriteria: Click on an empty (non-black) cell in the grid
Verify current clue is highlighted in clue list
Verify letter 'A' appears in the selected cell
Verify cursor auto-advances to next cell in direction

userStories.title: Toggle direction with arrow keys or click
userStories.description: As a player, I can toggle between Across and Down directions
acceptanceCriteria: Click on a cell that has both Across and Down clues
Click on the same cell again
Verify different clue is now highlighted

userStories.title: Click clue to jump to word
userStories.description: As a player, I can click a clue to jump to that word in the grid
acceptanceCriteria: Click on a clue in the Across list (e.g., '1 Across')
Verify the first cell of that word is selected in the grid
Click on a clue in the Down list (e.g., '2 Down')
Verify selection jumps to first cell of that word

userStories.title: Reveal single letter hint
userStories.description: As a player, I can reveal a single letter as a hint
acceptanceCriteria: Find and click the 'Reveal Letter' button
Verify the correct letter appears in the cell
Verify cell is marked as 'revealed' (different styling)

userStories.title: Reveal entire word hint
userStories.description: As a player, I can reveal an entire word as a hint
acceptanceCriteria: Click on a cell in a word
Find and click the 'Reveal Word' button
Verify all letters in the current word are revealed
Verify all revealed cells are marked appropriately

userStories.title: Check answers shows errors
userStories.description: As a player, I can check my answers and see which are incorrect
acceptanceCriteria: Fill in several cells with incorrect letters
Fill in some cells with correct letters
Verify incorrect cells are highlighted in red/error state

userStories.title: Timer tracks elapsed time
userStories.description: As a player, the timer tracks my solve time
acceptanceCriteria: Verify timer is visible and shows 00:00

userStories.title: Progress percentage updates
userStories.description: As a player, I see my progress percentage as I fill cells
acceptanceCriteria: Fill in 5 cells with any letters

userStories.title: Complete puzzle saves history
userStories.description: As a logged-in player, completing a puzzle saves to my history
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Use 'Reveal All' or manually complete the entire puzzle
Verify API returns 201 with PuzzleHistory record
Verify success modal appears with celebration
Verify final solve time is displayed
Verify the completed puzzle appears in history

userStories.title: View puzzle archive
userStories.description: As a user, I can browse the puzzle archive
acceptanceCriteria: Launch Playwright browser in headless mode
Verify API returns 200 with paginated puzzle list
Verify puzzle cards are displayed (up to 12 per page)
Verify each card shows puzzle date
Verify each card shows difficulty badge

userStories.title: Filter archive by difficulty
userStories.description: As a user, I can filter puzzles by difficulty
acceptanceCriteria: Verify only Easy puzzles are displayed
Verify only Hard puzzles are displayed

userStories.title: Navigate archive pagination
userStories.description: As a user, I can navigate between pages of archive results
acceptanceCriteria: Verify API called with page=2 parameter

userStories.title: Play puzzle from archive
userStories.description: As a user, I can click a puzzle in the archive to play it
acceptanceCriteria: Verify API returns 200 with puzzle data
Verify the selected puzzle loads in the grid
Take screenshot of loaded archive puzzle

userStories.title: Create multiplayer room
userStories.description: As a logged-in user, I can create a new multiplayer room
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify room creation form is displayed
Verify API returns 201 with room object
Verify room code is displayed prominently
Take screenshot of created room lobby

userStories.title: Room creation with different modes
userStories.description: As a user, I can create rooms with different game modes
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify room is created with race mode

userStories.title: Join room with 6-character code
userStories.description: As a logged-in user, I can join a room by entering a 6-character code
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify 6 input fields for room code are displayed
Enter room code character by character (e.g., 'ABC123')
Verify auto-advance to next field on character input
Verify API returns 200 with room and player data
Verify player name appears in players list

userStories.title: Invalid room code shows error
userStories.description: As a user, I see an error when entering an invalid room code
acceptanceCriteria: Complete AUTH-02 to be logged in
Verify error message 'Room not found' is displayed
Verify user remains on join page

userStories.title: View players in room lobby
userStories.description: As a player, I can see the list of players in the room lobby
acceptanceCriteria: Complete ROOM-01 to create a room
Verify player list is displayed in lobby
Verify host (you) appears in the list
Verify each player shows display name
Verify each player shows assigned color
Verify room code is prominently displayed

userStories.title: Toggle ready status
userStories.description: As a player, I can toggle my ready status in the lobby
acceptanceCriteria: Complete ROOM-01 or JOIN-01 to be in a room lobby
Verify your status shows as 'Not Ready'
Verify API returns 200 with ready: true
Click button again to toggle off
Verify status changes back to 'Not Ready'

userStories.title: Host starts game
userStories.description: As the host, I can start the game when players are ready
acceptanceCriteria: Complete ROOM-01 to create a room (you are host)
Verify 'Start Game' button is visible (host only)

userStories.title: WebSocket connection established
userStories.description: As a player in multiplayer, WebSocket connects automatically
acceptanceCriteria: Complete LOBBY-03 to start a multiplayer game
Verify room_state message received with full state

userStories.title: Cell updates sync across players
userStories.description: As a player, my cell updates are broadcast to other players
acceptanceCriteria: Complete WS-01 to establish WebSocket connection
Click on a cell in the grid
Verify cell_update message sent via WebSocket
Verify the cell shows the letter with player's color

userStories.title: Player cursors visible
userStories.description: As a player, I can see other players' cursor positions
acceptanceCriteria: Complete WS-01 to establish WebSocket connection
Verify cursor_move message sent via WebSocket
Verify other players' cursors are visible with their colors

userStories.title: Chat messages in multiplayer
userStories.description: As a player, I can send and receive chat messages
acceptanceCriteria: Complete WS-01 to establish WebSocket connection
Verify message appears in chat history with your name

userStories.title: Player progress updates in race mode
userStories.description: As a player in race mode, I see live progress for all players
acceptanceCriteria: Verify race_progress message received via WebSocket
Verify leaderboard shows all players' progress percentages

userStories.title: Header navigation works
userStories.description: As a user, I can navigate to different pages via header
acceptanceCriteria: Verify logo is visible in header

userStories.title: Protected routes redirect unauthenticated users
userStories.description: As an unauthenticated user, I am redirected from protected routes
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure no token in localStorage (logged out)

userStories.title: 404 page for invalid routes
userStories.description: As a user, I see a 404 page for invalid routes
acceptanceCriteria: Verify link to return home exists

userStories.title: Network error handling
userStories.description: As a user, I see appropriate error messages on network failures

userStories.title: 401 unauthorized clears session
userStories.description: As a user with expired token, I am logged out and redirected
acceptanceCriteria: Set an expired/invalid token in localStorage
Verify token is cleared from localStorage

userStories.title: Landing page hero and CTAs
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see an engaging landing page with call-to-action buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Verify 'Play with Friends' button is visible

userStories.title: Daily puzzle preview on landing
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see today's puzzle preview on the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Verify API returns 200 with puzzle data
Verify daily puzzle preview section exists

metadata.instructions: Each story must be verified using Playwright in headless mode. Launch browser, perform actions, intercept API calls, and take screenshots to confirm the complete user flow works end-to-end.
